channel.title: NameQuick Updates
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 1.8.12
item.description:
v1.8.12

Features

  • Consolidated app settings into more intuitive categories for easier navigation.
  • Renamed the “Pattern Extraction” feature to “Templates” for improved clarity.
    • Templates let you describe key information you want to extract (e.g., “Invoice Date”, “Company Name”) and automatically rename files based on that content.
  • Improved overall performance and reliability.
  • Removed the “Reload” button — the app now seamlessly detects new files and file changes, keeping the UI in sync with Finder in real time.
  • Other small stylistic improvements.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed a JSON object error when using Templates with OpenAI.
